<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Bottle the Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2396)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 267

**Domain**
[Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=111)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You would take [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) damage.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

When lightning is turned against you, you store the charge safely within yourself, unleashing it when the time is right. You gain [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) 10 against the triggering effect. If you successfully prevent damage in this way, at any time during the spell’s duration, you can spend a single action, which has the [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=540) trait, to expend the charge and make a spell attack against the AC of a target within 60 feet. This attack deals electricity damage equal to the damage prevented by bottle the storm. If you Cast _bottle the storm_ a second time before the original duration elapses, or if you do not make this attack within 1 minute, the stored charge dissipates harmlessly.

---
**Heightened (7th)** The resistance increases to 15, and you can immediately make the spell attack granted by _bottle the storm_ as part of the reaction used to Cast the Spell.

**Heightened (10th)** The resistance increases to 20, and you can immediately make the spell attack granted by _bottle the storm_ as part of the reaction used to Cast the Spell.
name: Bottle the Storm
